file_content.text: That man kidnapped me because of you, Risha. He was going to kill us both. Why?
It... doesn't matter. I'm sorry for what happened, but it's over.
You're sorry? He held me prisoner for days, threatened to kill me, and you're sorry?
Audila! When I heard the shooting, I thought....
You thought wrong. Show her how happy you are to see her.
Shut up and kiss her.
I'm never letting you out of my sight again.
Weren't you supposed to stay outside?
What are you doing here?
I had to know if she was alright.
You thought you'd hide in the sand and wait for the shooting to stop.
You didn't think, coward.
No! I... I should have been here the whole time.
I'm alright, Juran--but I never want to see Risha again. We're done.
I just risked my life for you.
She wouldn't keep a secret without good reason, Audila.
Give Risha a chance.
I promise I'll explain everything to you, someday. Have I ever let you down?
Risha told me you're like a sister to her.
Don't throw away friendship.
We've been through a lot; that's what made this so horrible.
There's always a first time, right?
Maybe not yet....
Thanks for the support.
I need to get off this stinking planet--get a bit of distance--think....
Here, take these credits. They'll get you off Tatooine. Help you start over someplace better.
I'll want that explanation someday, Risha. I'll let you know where to find us.
I hope so.
Thanks for taking care of these scum, Captain. The galaxy is a better place without them.
I think you're lying.
See? Even your own people don't trust you.
Technically, I'm the one who rescued your friend.
Mostly, you risked mine.
Please, Audila... you know I'd never do anything to put you in danger.
You already did--and you won't even tell me why.
You're the one who got her in this mess.
After getting her kidnapped.
Audila, do you really think I'd take chances with your life?
I don't even know who you are anymore.
Come on, Juran. We're going.
That could've gone better. At least you got rid of those scum.
I have a lot of unanswered questions.
What was that all about?
Don't we all? They'll have to wait for another time.
I'm sorry things went badly.
I'll be fine. I'm always fine.
I didn't kill these idiots for your sense of justice.
Time to pay up.
I haven't forgotten our deal. I have your payment, just like I promised.
They seemed like they needed killing.
It was the right thing.
We're done here. See you back at the ship.
